ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: Offentligt udbud nr. 2597 vedrørende eksterne ydelser inden for varemærkestrategi, grafisk design og litografi
Bekanntmachung Unbeschränkte Ausschreibung Nr. 2607 für externe Dienstleistungen im Bereich Branding, Design und Lithografie
Published notice open invitation to tender no. 2607 relating to external services in the field of branding, design and lithography
Anuncio de licitación abierto a la competencia n. ° 2597 relativo a servicios externos en el ámbito de la gestión de marcas, el diseño gráfico y la litografía
Avoin tarjouskilpailukutsu n:o 2597 ulkoisista palveluista tavaramerkin hallinnan, graafisen suunnittelun ja litografian aloilla
Avis d'appel ouvert à la concurrence no 2597 relatif aux prestations externes dans le domaine de la gestion de la marque, de la conception graphique et de la lithographie
Ανοιχτή πρόσκληση υποβολής προσφορών αριθ. 2597 σχετικά με την παροχή εξωτερικών υπηρεσιών στον τομέα διαχείρισης της επωνυμίας, του γραφικού σχεδιασμού και της λιθογραφικής εκτύπωσης
Bando di gara con procedura aperta n. 2597, relativo alle prestazioni esterne nel campo della gestione del marchio, della concezione grafica e della litografia
Bekendmaking van aankondiging van openbare uitnodiging tot inschrijving nr. 2597 betreffende externe diensten op het gebied van merkbeheer, grafisch ontwerp en lithografie
Anúncio de concurso público n.º 2597 relativo a serviços externos no domínio de gestão de marca, conceção gráfica e litografia
Öppen anbudsinfordran nr 2597 avseende externa tjänster inom området för märkning, grafisk formgivning och litografi
Zveřejnění oznámení o otevřené výzvě k podání nabídek č. 2597 týkající se poskytování externích služeb v oblasti řízení značky, grafického návrhu a litografie
Avatud pakkumiskutse konkursile nr 2597, mis käsitleb kaubamärgi haldamise, graafilise disaini ja litograafia välisteenuste osutamist
2597. számú nyílt ajánlati felhívás külső szolgáltatásokra irányulóan a márkamenedzsment, grafikai tervezés és litográfia terén
Skelbimas apie atvirą konkursą Nr. 2597 dėl išorinių paslaugų prekių ženklo valdymo, grafinio dizaino ir litografijos srityje
Paziņojums par atklātu uzaicinājumu uz konkursu Nr. 2597 saistībā ar ārējiem pakalpojumiem zīmola vadības, grafiskā dizaina un litogrāfijas jomā
Avviż ta' offerta miftuħa għas-sejħa Nru 2597 dwar is-servizzi esterni fil-qasam tal-ġestjoni tad-ditta, għad-disinn grafiku u l-litografija
Otwarte zaproszenie do składania ofert nr 2597 dotyczące usług zewnętrznych w dziedzinie zarządzania marką, koncepcji graficznej i litografii
Oznámenie o vyhlásení verejnej súťaže č. 2597 týkajúcej sa externých služieb v oblasti správy ochrannej známky, grafického dizajnu a litografie
Obvestilo o odprtem javnem razpisu št. 2597 za naročilo zunanjih storitev na področju upravljanja blagovne znamke, grafičnega oblikovanja in litografije
Cuireadh oscailte chun tairisceana uimh. 2597 maidir le seirbhísí seachtracha i réimse na bainistíochta branda, an dearaidh ghrafaigh agus na liteagrafaíochta
Обявление за открит конкурс №2597 относно външни услуги в областта на управлението на марката, графичния дизайн и литографията
Anunț de cerere de oferte deschisă nr. 2597 privind serviciile externe în domeniul gestionării mărcii, al designului grafic și al litografiei
Otvoreni poziv na nadmetanje br. 2597 za vanjske usluge u području upravljanja markama, grafičkim dizajnom i litografijom

TI_DOC.P: DE-München: Offentligt udbud nr. 2597 vedrørende eksterne ydelser inden for varemærkestrategi, grafisk design og litografi

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: acting through the European Patent Office: Headquarters, Bob-van-Benthem-Platz 1, D-80469 Munich, Postal address: EPO, D-80298

TXT_MARK.P: The European Patent Organisation is an intergovernmental organisation set up pursuant to the European Patent Convention which entered into force in 1977. At present it has 38 member states (Albania, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Monaco, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, San Marino, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey and United Kingdom). The executive body of the EPO is the European Patent Office which is charged with the searching and examination of European patent applications and the granting of European patents. It employs approximately 7 000 staff at EPO headquarters in Munich, a branch at The Hague /Rijswijk (NL) and sub-offices in Berlin and Vienna.
Open invitation to tender with discretionary award of contract.
a) Purpose of the contract:
External services in the field of branding, design and lithography.
b) Division into lots:
Lot 1: Design
Visual identity guidelines, concept and design of a wide variety of external publications as well as creative themes for campaigns. The selected agency will act as the lead design agency of the EPO.
Lot 2: Brand consultancy
Analysis of the brand to enrich and sharpen its positioning and profile. Development of an approach to monitor the brand on a regular basis.
Lot 3: Lithography and digital printing of small volumes

This includes all pre-print services such as creation of printing files, retouching of images, proofing, ensuring a high quality implementation of photos and images in final printouts. This lot also includes digital printing of small batches.
c) Any deposits and guarantees required:
Not applicable.
d) Main terms concerning payment:
Within 30 (thirty) days of receipt of the correct invoice.
e) Qualifications required by law
Not applicable.
a) Place at which the contract is to be performed:
European Patent Office’s headquarter in Munich.
(NUTS-Code DE212 M DE212 München, Kreisfreie Stadt)
b) Duration of contract or time limit for delivery or completion of services /work:
5 years.
Proposals for variants, the effect of which would be to reduce significantly the rights and safeguards of the EPO, are not allowed.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Requests for the Procurement Documents and receipt of bids:

TXT_MARK.P: a) Name and address of department from which the procurement documents and clarification of the procurement documents may be requested:
European Patent Office, PD48 central procurement, tender nº. 2607, 80298 Munich - Germany, E-mail: mntenderclarifications@epo.org
Procurement Documents will be forwarded upon written or e-mail request.
b) Final date for receipt by the EPO of requests for the procurement documents:
c) Final date for receipt by the EPO of requests for clarification:
Questions must be submitted by e-mail.
d) Final date for receipt of bids /number of copies to be sent:
Bids must be submitted in signed paper original plus an electronic version of all documents on a data-carrier.
e) Address to which the requests for clarification and bids must be sent:
As in point 6(a).
Please submit requests for qualification in writing, preferably by e-mail.
Please submit bids by post only and not by e-mail. Bids submitted by or e-mail will be excluded.
f) Language or languages in which requests for clarification and bids must be drawn up:
English. The procurement documents will be available in English only.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Legal form of the grouping in the event of a joint bid:

TXT_MARK.P: If several bidders submit a joint bid, they must be jointly and severally liable for the performance of the obligations under the contract. A declaration to this effect, duly signed by all members of the grouping and appointing a representative that is authorised to act on behalf of all members, must be submitted with the bid.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Criteria for assessing bidders' know-how, capacity and reliability to fulfil the contract:

TXT_MARK.P: Bids from bidders who do not fulfil the selection criteria stated in the procurement documents and/or whose circumstances are such as seriously to call into question their financial and professional reliability (see Article 2 of the general conditions of tender, available under www.epo.org) will not be considered for contract award.

Bidders' know-how, capacity and reliability to fulfil the contract will be assessed on basis of the information and evidence submitted in reply to the questionnaire in Annex 1 to the general conditions of tender and any additional questionnaire(s) included in the procurement documents.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Period during which the bidder is bound by his bid:

TXT_MARK.P: 6 months following the final date for receipt of bids indicated in point 6(d).

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Criteria for the award of contract:

TXT_MARK.P: Financial criteria: 40 %
Quality criteria /Technical criteria: 50 %
Bid presentation: 10 %
For further information see procurement documents.

Bid presentations with key personnel of around 5 short-listed bidders are expected to take place in calendar weeks 17 and 18 (23.4.2018 – 4.5.2018) in Munich. Respective costs incurred by the bidders relating to such a presentation will not be reimbursed.
Contract award is expected to take place in the second half of 6.2018.
NUTS-Code DE212 M DE212 München, Kreisfreie Stadt)

TI_DOC.P: DE-München: Bekanntmachung Unbeschränkte Ausschreibung Nr. 2607 für externe Dienstleistungen im Bereich Branding, Design und Lithografie

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , handelnd durch das Europäische Patentamt mit Hauptsitz in 80469 München, Bob-van-Benthem-Platz 1, Postanschrift: EPA, 80298

TXT_MARK.P: Die Europäische Patentorganisation ist eine zwischenstaatliche Organisation, die durch das 1977 in Kraft getretene Europäische Patentübereinkommen gegründet wurde. Ihr gehören derzeit 38 Mitgliedstaaten an (Albanien, Belgien, Bulgarien, Dänemark, Deutschland, Ehemalige jugoslawische Republik Mazedonien, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Irland, Island, Italien, Kroatien, Lettland, Liechtenstein, Litauen, Luxemburg, Malta, Monaco, Niederlande, Norwegen, Österreich, Polen, Portugal, Rumänien, San Marino, Schweden, Schweiz, Serbien, Slowakei, Slowenien, Spanien, Tschechische Republik, Türkei, Ungarn, Vereinigtes Königreich und Zypern). Ausführendes Organ der EPO ist das Europäische Patentamt, das die Recherche und Prüfung europäischer Patentanmeldungen und die Erteilung europäischer Patente zur Aufgabe hat. Es beschäftigt rund 6700 Bedienstete am Hauptsitz in München, in einer Zweigstelle in Den Haag (Rijswijk (NL)) und in zwei Dienststellen in Berlin und Wien. (Die Zahl der Mitgliedstaaten und der Bediensteten kann sich ändern.)
Unbeschränkte Ausschreibung im Leistungswettbewerb
a) Gegenstand des Auftrags:
Externe Dienstleistungen im Bereich Branding, Design und Lithografie.
b) Teilung in Lose:
Los 1: Design

Richtlinien zur Corporate Identity, Konzeption und Design eines breiten Spektrums von externen Publikationen sowie kreative Gestaltung von Kampagnen. Die ausgewählte Agentur wird als führende Designagentur des EPA tätig sein.
Los 2: Branding-Beratung
Analyse der Marke im Hinblick auf eine verbesserte Positionierung und Profilschärfung. Entwicklung einer Methode zur regelmäßigen Überwachung der Marke.
Los 3: Lithografie und Digitaldruck von kleinen Stückzahlen

Hierzu gehören sämtliche Dienstleistungen zum Vorabdruck wie Erstellung von Druckdateien und Korrekturfahnen, Bildbearbeitung sowie Gewährleistung einer qualitativ hochwertigen Darstellung von Fotos und Bildern im fertigen Druck. Dieses Los umfasst auch den Digitaldruck von kleinen Stückzahlen.
c) Erforderliche Sicherheiten und Bürgschaften: nicht zutreffend,
d) Wichtigste Zahlungsbedingungen: innerhalb von 30 Tagen nach Erhalt einer korrekten Rechnung,
e) Rechtlich vorgeschriebene Qualifikationen: nicht zutreffend.
a) Erfüllungsort:
Hauptsitz des Europäischen Patentamts in München (NUTS-Code DE212 M DE212 München, Kreisfreie Stadt)
b) Vertragslaufzeit oder Ausführungsfrist:
5 Jahre.
Änderungsvorschläge, die sich in einer erheblichen Einschränkung der Rechte und Sicherheiten der EPO niederschlagen würden, sind nicht zulässig.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Anforderung der Verdingungsunterlagen und Abgabe des Angebots:

TXT_MARK.P: a) Bezeichnung und Anschrift der Stelle, bei der die Verdingungsunterlagen und Zusatzauskünfte dazu angefordert werden können:
Europäisches Patentamt, HD 4.8 – Zentrale Beschaffung, Ausschreibung Nr. 2607, 80298 München, Deutschland
E-Mail: mntenderclarifications@epo.org
Die Verdingungsunterlagen können schriftlich oder per E-Mail angefordert werden.
b) Annahmeschluss für die Anforderung der Verdingungsunterlagen bei der EPO:
c) Annahmeschluss für Rückfragen bei der EPO:
Rückfragen sind schriftlich oder per E-Mail einzureichen.
d) Annahmeschluss für Angebote/Zahl der einzureichenden Ausfertigungen:
Angebote sind in unterzeichneter Originalausfertigung auf Papier sowie vollständig in elektronischer Form auf einem Datenträger einzureichen.
e) Anschrift, an die Rückfragen und das Angebot zu richten sind:
Wie unter Nr. 6 a)
Rückfragen sind schriftlich, vorzugsweise per E-Mail, einzureichen.
Bitte reichen Sie Ihr Angebot nur per Post und nicht per E-Mail ein. Per E-Mail eingereichte Angebote werden ausgeschlossen.
f) Sprache oder Sprachen, in denen Rückfragen und das Angebot abzufassen sind:
Englisch. Die Verdingungsunterlagen sind nur auf Englisch erhältlich.

Reichen mehrere Bieter ein gemeinsames Angebot ein, so haften sie gesamtschuldnerisch für die Erfüllung der vertraglichen Verpflichtungen. Zusammen mit dem Angebot ist eine entsprechende von allen Mitgliedern der Bietergemeinschaft unterzeichnete Erklärung einzureichen, in der ein Vertreter bestimmt ist, der bevollmächtigt ist, für alle Mitglieder zu handeln.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Kriterien für die Beurteilung der zur Auftragsausführung erforderlichen Fachkunde, Leistungsfähigkeit und Zuverlässigkeit des Bieters:

TXT_MARK.P: Angebote von Bietern, die nicht die in den Verdingungsunterlagen genannten Auswahlkriterien erfüllen und/oder deren finanzielle und professionelle Zuverlässigkeit aufgrund ihrer Verhältnisse ernstlich infrage steht (s. Artikel 2 der Allgemeinen Ausschreibungsbedingungen, abrufbar unter www.epo.org), sind von der Auftragsvergabe ausgeschlossen.

Die zur Auftragsausführung erforderliche Fachkunde, Leistungsfähigkeit und Zuverlässigkeit des Bieters wird auf der Grundlage der Angaben und Nachweise beurteilt, die in Beantwortung des Fragebogens in Anhang 1 der Allgemeinen Ausschreibungsbedingungen und zusätzlicher Fragebögen zu den Verdingungsunterlagen erbracht werden.
Sechs Monate ab dem unter Nr. 6 d) angegebenen Annahmeschluss für Angebote

Die Angebotspräsentationen mit dem Schlüsselpersonal von etwa 5 in die engere Wahl gezogenen Bietern finden voraussichtlich in der 17. und 18. Kalenderwoche (23.4.2018 – 4.5.2018) in München statt. Die Kosten, die den Bietern dadurch entstehen, werden von der EPO nicht erstattet. Derzeit wird davon ausgegangen, dass der Zuschlag in der zweiten 6 2018 erteilt wird.
NUTS-Code DE212 M DE212 München, Kreisfreie Stadt

TI_DOC.P: DE-München: Avoin tarjouskilpailukutsu n:o 2597 ulkoisista palveluista tavaramerkin hallinnan, graafisen suunnittelun ja litografian aloilla

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: acting through the European Patent Office: Headquarters, Bob-van-Benthem-Platz 1, D-80469 Munich, Postal address: EPO, D-80298

TXT_MARK.P: The European Patent Organisation is an intergovernmental organisation set up pursuant to the European Patent Convention which entered into force in 1977. At present it has 38 member states (Albania, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Monaco, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, San Marino, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey and United Kingdom). The executive body of the EPO is the European Patent Office which is charged with the searching and examination of European patent applications and the granting of European patents. It employs approximately 7 000 staff at EPO headquarters in Munich, a branch at The Hague /Rijswijk (NL) and sub-offices in Berlin and Vienna.
Open invitation to tender with discretionary award of contract.
a) Purpose of the contract:
External services in the field of branding, design and lithography.
b) Division into lots:
Lot 1: Design
Visual identity guidelines, concept and design of a wide variety of external publications as well as creative themes for campaigns. The selected agency will act as the lead design agency of the EPO.
Lot 2: Brand consultancy
Analysis of the brand to enrich and sharpen its positioning and profile. Development of an approach to monitor the brand on a regular basis.
Lot 3: Lithography and digital printing of small volumes

This includes all pre-print services such as creation of printing files, retouching of images, proofing, ensuring a high quality implementation of photos and images in final printouts. This lot also includes digital printing of small batches.
c) Any deposits and guarantees required:
Not applicable.
d) Main terms concerning payment:
Within 30 (thirty) days of receipt of the correct invoice.
e) Qualifications required by law
Not applicable.
a) Place at which the contract is to be performed:
European Patent Office’s headquarter in Munich.
(NUTS-Code DE212 M DE212 München, Kreisfreie Stadt)
b) Duration of contract or time limit for delivery or completion of services /work:
5 years.
Proposals for variants, the effect of which would be to reduce significantly the rights and safeguards of the EPO, are not allowed.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Requests for the Procurement Documents and receipt of bids:

TXT_MARK.P: a) Name and address of department from which the procurement documents and clarification of the procurement documents may be requested:
European Patent Office, PD48 central procurement, tender nº. 2607, 80298 Munich - Germany, E-mail: mntenderclarifications@epo.org
Procurement Documents will be forwarded upon written or e-mail request.
b) Final date for receipt by the EPO of requests for the procurement documents:
c) Final date for receipt by the EPO of requests for clarification:
Questions must be submitted by e-mail.
d) Final date for receipt of bids /number of copies to be sent:
Bids must be submitted in signed paper original plus an electronic version of all documents on a data-carrier.
e) Address to which the requests for clarification and bids must be sent:
As in point 6(a).
Please submit requests for qualification in writing, preferably by e-mail.
Please submit bids by post only and not by e-mail. Bids submitted by or e-mail will be excluded.
f) Language or languages in which requests for clarification and bids must be drawn up:
English. The procurement documents will be available in English only.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Legal form of the grouping in the event of a joint bid:

TXT_MARK.P: If several bidders submit a joint bid, they must be jointly and severally liable for the performance of the obligations under the contract. A declaration to this effect, duly signed by all members of the grouping and appointing a representative that is authorised to act on behalf of all members, must be submitted with the bid.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Criteria for assessing bidders' know-how, capacity and reliability to fulfil the contract:

TXT_MARK.P: Bids from bidders who do not fulfil the selection criteria stated in the procurement documents and/or whose circumstances are such as seriously to call into question their financial and professional reliability (see Article 2 of the general conditions of tender, available under www.epo.org) will not be considered for contract award.

Bidders' know-how, capacity and reliability to fulfil the contract will be assessed on basis of the information and evidence submitted in reply to the questionnaire in Annex 1 to the general conditions of tender and any additional questionnaire(s) included in the procurement documents.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Period during which the bidder is bound by his bid:

TXT_MARK.P: 6 months following the final date for receipt of bids indicated in point 6(d).

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Criteria for the award of contract:

TXT_MARK.P: Financial criteria: 40 %
Quality criteria /Technical criteria: 50 %
Bid presentation: 10 %
For further information see procurement documents.

Bid presentations with key personnel of around 5 short-listed bidders are expected to take place in calendar weeks 17 and 18 (23.4.2018 – 4.5.2018) in Munich. Respective costs incurred by the bidders relating to such a presentation will not be reimbursed.
Contract award is expected to take place in the second half of 6.2018.
NUTS-Code DE212 M DE212 München, Kreisfreie Stadt)

TI_DOC.P: DE-Munich: Avis d'appel ouvert à la concurrence no 2597 relatif aux prestations externes dans le domaine de la gestion de la marque, de la conception graphique et de la lithographie

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , agissant par l'intermédiaire de l'Office européen des brevets sise: Bob-Van-Benthem-Platz 1, D-80469 Munich; adresse postale: OEB, D-80298

TXT_MARK.P: L'Organisation européenne des brevets est une organisation intergouvernementale créée conformément à la convention sur le brevet européen qui est entrée en vigueur en 1977. Elle compte actuellement 38 États membres (l'Albanie, l’Allemagne, l’Autriche, la Belgique, la Bulgarie, Chypre, la Croatie, le Danemark, l’Espagne, l'Estonie, l'ex-République yougoslave de Macédoine, la Finlande, la France, la Grèce, la Hongrie, l’Irlande, l’Islande, l’Italie, la Lettonie, le Liechtenstein, la Lituanie, le Luxembourg, Malte, Monaco, la Norvège, les Pays-Bas, la Pologne, le Portugal, la Roumanie, le Royaume-Uni, Saint-Marin, la Serbie, la Slovaquie, la Slovénie, la Suède, la Suisse, la République tchèque et la Turquie). L'organe exécutif de l'OEB est l'Office européen des brevets, qui est chargé de la recherche et de l'examen concernant les demandes de brevet européen et de la délivrance de brevets européens. Il emploie environ 6 700 agents en poste à son siège à Munich, dans son département à La Haye/Rijswijk (NL) et dans ses agences à Berlin et à Vienne (le nombre d'États membres et d'agents indiqués peut changer).
Appel d'offres ouvert.
a) objet du marché: prestations externes dans le domaine de la gestion de la marque, de la conception graphique et de la lithographie;
b) partage en lots:
— lot 1 conception graphique:

définition des lignes directrices de l’identité visuelle, conception et réalisation de diverses publications externes ainsi que le développement de thèmes novateurs de campagnes de promotion de la marque. L'agence de communication visuelle choisie agira à titre d’agence de design principale pour le compte de l’OEB,
— lot 2 conseil en marque:
analyse de la marque afin de consolider son positionnement et aiguiser son profil. Élaboration d’une approche de suivi régulier de la marque,
— lot 3 lithographie et impression numérique à petite échelle:

cela comprend l’ensemble des services de prépresse comme la création des fichiers d'impression, la retouche d’images ainsi que la production d'épreuves garantissant une mise en place d’images et de photos de grande qualité dans les tirages finaux.
Ce lot comprend également l’impression numérique de petites quantités;
c) dépôts et garanties exigés: sans objet;
d) principales conditions relatives au paiement: dans un délai de 30 jours à compter de la réception d'une facture correcte;
e) qualifications exigées par la loi: sans objet.
a) Lieu où le marché doit être exécuté:
Le siège de l'Office européen des brevets à Munich
(Code NUTS: DE212 M DE212 München, Kreisfreie Stadt)
b) Durée du contrat ou délai de livraison ou d'exécution des prestations: 5 ans.
Les propositions de variantes susceptibles de réduire de façon significative les droits et garanties de l'OEB ne sont pas autorisées.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Nom et adresse du service auprès duquel peuvent être demandés le cahier des charges et des précisions concernant celui-ci:

TXT_MARK.P: Office européen des brevets, service central des achats PD48, appel d’offres no 2607, 80298 Munich — Allemagne
Adresse électronique: mntenderclarifications@epo.org
Le cahier des charges est envoyé sur demande faite par écrit ou par courrier électronique.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Date limite de réception par l'OEB des demandes d'envoi du cahier des charges:
Date limite de réception par l'OEB des demandes de précisions:

TXT_MARK.P: Les questions doivent être soumises par lettre ou courrier électronique.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Date limite de dépôt des offres / nombre d'exemplaires à envoyer à l'office:

TXT_MARK.P: Les offres doivent être soumises en version originale papier signée ainsi qu'en version électronique enregistrée sur un support contenant tous les documents.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Adresse à laquelle doivent être envoyées les demandes de précisions et les offres:

TXT_MARK.P: Idem point 6 (a).
Les demandes de précisions doivent être soumises par écrit, de préférence par courrier électronique.
Les offres doivent être soumises uniquement par courrier postal et non par courrier électronique. Les offres envoyées par courrier électronique ne seront pas prises en considération.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Langue ou langues dans lesquelles les demandes de précisions et les offres doivent être rédigées:

TXT_MARK.P: Anglais. Le cahier des charges ne sera disponible qu’en anglais.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Forme légale du groupement, en cas d'offre soumise en commun:

TXT_MARK.P: Si des candidats soumettent une offre en commun, ils doivent être conjointement et solidairement responsables de l'exécution des obligations découlant du contrat.
Une déclaration à cet effet, dûment signée par tous les membres du groupement et désignant un représentant autorisé à agir pour le compte de tous les membres doit accompagner l'offre.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Critères visant à évaluer les compétences, les capacités et la fiabilité des candidats pour pouvoir exécuter le marché:

TXT_MARK.P: Seront éliminées les offres émanant de candidats qui ne satisfont pas aux critères de sélection énoncés dans le cahier des charges et/ou dont la situation suscite des doutes sérieux quant à leur fiabilité du point de vue financier et professionnel (cf. article 2 des conditions générales relatives aux appels à la concurrence, qui figurent à l'adresse www.epo.org).

Les compétences, les capacités et la fiabilité des candidats pour pouvoir exécuter le marché seront évaluées sur la base des informations et pièces justificatives soumises en réponse au questionnaire de l'annexe 1 aux conditions générales relatives aux appels à la concurrence et en réponse à tout questionnaire supplémentaire inclus dans le cahier des charges 9.
Durée obligatoire de validité des offres:

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Durée obligatoire de validité des offres:

TXT_MARK.P: 6 mois à compter de la date limite de dépôt des offres indiquée au point 6 d).
— critères financiers: 40 %,
— critères de qualité / éléments techniques: 50 %,
— présentation de l'offre: 10 %,
Pour plus d'informations, voir le cahier des charges

Environ 5 membres clés du personnel des soumissionnaires présélectionnés seront probablement invités à présenter leur offre pendant les semaines civiles 17 et 18 (entre le 23.4.2018 et le 4.5.2018) à Munich.
Les frais engagés par les candidats pour ces présentations ne seront pas remboursés.
L’attribution du marché aura lieu probablement au cours de la seconde moitié du mois de juin 2018.
Code NUTS: DE212 M DE212 München, Kreisfreie Stadt.

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: acting through the European Patent Office: Headquarters, Bob-van-Benthem-Platz 1, D-80469 Munich, Postal address: EPO, D-80298

TXT_MARK.P: The European Patent Organisation is an intergovernmental organisation set up pursuant to the European Patent Convention which entered into force in 1977. At present it has 38 member states (Albania, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Monaco, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, San Marino, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey and United Kingdom). The executive body of the EPO is the European Patent Office which is charged with the searching and examination of European patent applications and the granting of European patents. It employs approximately 7 000 staff at EPO headquarters in Munich, a branch at The Hague /Rijswijk (NL) and sub-offices in Berlin and Vienna.
Open invitation to tender with discretionary award of contract.
a) Purpose of the contract:
External services in the field of branding, design and lithography.
b) Division into lots:
Lot 1: Design
Visual identity guidelines, concept and design of a wide variety of external publications as well as creative themes for campaigns. The selected agency will act as the lead design agency of the EPO.
Lot 2: Brand consultancy
Analysis of the brand to enrich and sharpen its positioning and profile. Development of an approach to monitor the brand on a regular basis.
Lot 3: Lithography and digital printing of small volumes

This includes all pre-print services such as creation of printing files, retouching of images, proofing, ensuring a high quality implementation of photos and images in final printouts. This lot also includes digital printing of small batches.
c) Any deposits and guarantees required:
Not applicable.
d) Main terms concerning payment:
Within 30 (thirty) days of receipt of the correct invoice.
e) Qualifications required by law
Not applicable.
a) Place at which the contract is to be performed:
European Patent Office’s headquarter in Munich.
(NUTS-Code DE212 M DE212 München, Kreisfreie Stadt)
b) Duration of contract or time limit for delivery or completion of services /work:
5 years.
Proposals for variants, the effect of which would be to reduce significantly the rights and safeguards of the EPO, are not allowed.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Requests for the Procurement Documents and receipt of bids:

TXT_MARK.P: a) Name and address of department from which the procurement documents and clarification of the procurement documents may be requested:
European Patent Office, PD48 central procurement, tender nº. 2607, 80298 Munich - Germany, E-mail: mntenderclarifications@epo.org
Procurement Documents will be forwarded upon written or e-mail request.
b) Final date for receipt by the EPO of requests for the procurement documents:
c) Final date for receipt by the EPO of requests for clarification:
Questions must be submitted by e-mail.
d) Final date for receipt of bids /number of copies to be sent:
Bids must be submitted in signed paper original plus an electronic version of all documents on a data-carrier.
e) Address to which the requests for clarification and bids must be sent:
As in point 6(a).
Please submit requests for qualification in writing, preferably by e-mail.
Please submit bids by post only and not by e-mail. Bids submitted by or e-mail will be excluded.
f) Language or languages in which requests for clarification and bids must be drawn up:
English. The procurement documents will be available in English only.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Legal form of the grouping in the event of a joint bid:

TXT_MARK.P: If several bidders submit a joint bid, they must be jointly and severally liable for the performance of the obligations under the contract. A declaration to this effect, duly signed by all members of the grouping and appointing a representative that is authorised to act on behalf of all members, must be submitted with the bid.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Criteria for assessing bidders' know-how, capacity and reliability to fulfil the contract:

TXT_MARK.P: Bids from bidders who do not fulfil the selection criteria stated in the procurement documents and/or whose circumstances are such as seriously to call into question their financial and professional reliability (see Article 2 of the general conditions of tender, available under www.epo.org) will not be considered for contract award.

Bidders' know-how, capacity and reliability to fulfil the contract will be assessed on basis of the information and evidence submitted in reply to the questionnaire in Annex 1 to the general conditions of tender and any additional questionnaire(s) included in the procurement documents.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Period during which the bidder is bound by his bid:

TXT_MARK.P: 6 months following the final date for receipt of bids indicated in point 6(d).

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Criteria for the award of contract:

TXT_MARK.P: Financial criteria: 40 %
Quality criteria /Technical criteria: 50 %
Bid presentation: 10 %
For further information see procurement documents.

Bid presentations with key personnel of around 5 short-listed bidders are expected to take place in calendar weeks 17 and 18 (23.4.2018 – 4.5.2018) in Munich. Respective costs incurred by the bidders relating to such a presentation will not be reimbursed.
Contract award is expected to take place in the second half of 6.2018.
NUTS-Code DE212 M DE212 München, Kreisfreie Stadt)

TXT_MARK.P: The European Patent Organisation is an intergovernmental organisation set up pursuant to the European Patent Convention which entered into force in 1977. At present it has 38 member states (Albania, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Monaco, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, San Marino, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey and United Kingdom). The executive body of the EPO is the European Patent Office which is charged with the searching and examination of European patent applications and the granting of European patents. It employs approximately 7 000 staff at EPO headquarters in Munich, a branch at The Hague /Rijswijk (NL) and sub-offices in Berlin and Vienna.
Open invitation to tender with discretionary award of contract.
a) Purpose of the contract:
External services in the field of branding, design and lithography.
b) Division into lots:
Lot 1: Design
Visual identity guidelines, concept and design of a wide variety of external publications as well as creative themes for campaigns. The selected agency will act as the lead design agency of the EPO.
Lot 2: Brand consultancy
Analysis of the brand to enrich and sharpen its positioning and profile. Development of an approach to monitor the brand on a regular basis.
Lot 3: Lithography and digital printing of small volumes

This includes all pre-print services such as creation of printing files, retouching of images, proofing, ensuring a high quality implementation of photos and images in final printouts. This lot also includes digital printing of small batches.
c) Any deposits and guarantees required:
Not applicable.
d) Main terms concerning payment:
Within 30 (thirty) days of receipt of the correct invoice.
e) Qualifications required by law
Not applicable.
a) Place at which the contract is to be performed:
European Patent Office’s headquarter in Munich.
(NUTS-Code DE212 M DE212 München, Kreisfreie Stadt)
b) Duration of contract or time limit for delivery or completion of services /work:
5 years.
Proposals for variants, the effect of which would be to reduce significantly the rights and safeguards of the EPO, are not allowed.

TXT_MARK.P: Bids from bidders who do not fulfil the selection criteria stated in the procurement documents and/or whose circumstances are such as seriously to call into question their financial and professional reliability (see Article 2 of the general conditions of tender, available under www.epo.org) will not be considered for contract award.

Quality criteria /Technical criteria: 50 %
Bid presentation: 10 %
